code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import'./PetDetails.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PetDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[pet,setPet]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:4000/api/v1/petdetails/".concat(id)).then(res=>{if(res.data.success){setPet(res.data.pet);}else{setError('Pet not found.');}}).catch(()=>{setError('Error fetching pet data.');});},[id]);if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error});if(!pet)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pet-details-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:4000/".concat(pet.profilePhoto),alt:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Breed:"})," ",pet.breed]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Age:"})," ",pet.age," years"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Bio:"})," ",pet.bio]}),pet.owner&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[pet.owner.phone&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Owner Phone:"})," ",pet.owner.phone]}),pet.owner.email&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Owner Email:"})," ",pet.owner.email]})]})]});};export default PetDetails;
